name: Nancy Drew®: The Haunted Carousel
description: Take a Spin with Danger to Unravel the Mystery of a Ghostly Merry-go-Round!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista Processor: 200MHz CPU Memory: 16MB RAM Graphics: 16-bit graphics video card DirectX®: 7.0 or Higher Hard Drive: 160 MB of free space Sound: 16-bit sound card

reviews.review_text: This was an interesting game and I learned new things about carousels, but because it is an older game it was a very fast playthrough. I would recommend it, but if you are interested in a more drawn out mystery I would suggest the Ransom of the Seven Ships or the Haunting of Castle Malloy.

The nancy drew series is a point and click adventure/detective type game where you find clues and figure out a crime. Yes, shes a girl. Yes, shes a ♥♥♥♥ing detective. They are good games. If you dont like it, then GTFO because you are missing out on some ♥♥♥♥ing adventures and puzzles and ♥♥♥♥.
